attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: allow all uk citizens,to own guns,both at home and to carry said guns concealed on their persons,on the street,to both protect our homes and families,and to protect us from gun gangs,drug gangs and criminal gangs,both foreign and domestic,who make it especially unsafe in our cities,it seems

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
